name: Lil Panda
description:
Lil Panda is a platformer adventure based game where our panda comes across various obstacles  to explore the new world that lies ahead him. 

Avoid obstacles by jumping and destroy enemies by attacking them .

Collect coins , mushroom , ice cream and loads of pickups to increase your score.

[How to Play]

Use left and right arrow keys to move.

Use space bar to jump  and hold space bar  for a higher jump.

Use Space bar + right arrow key for a forward jump (Similarly for  a backward jump with left arrow key).

Use left Ctrl key or left mouse button to attack the enemies.

Features:

3 completely new maps to explore.

3 challenging enemies

Loads of Pick ups to increase your score

Smooth user Interface
